channel.title: Is this Legal?
channel.description: Hi, I'm currently making a server (JamesScape). And my dad says I could get in a lot of trouble If I make a donation button without telling the government about my income tax. I live in the us. (this is a 317) I if it illeagle, how would I make it un illegal if is possible.. by the way if you know dodian that charges money for Premium Membership is that illegal?

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

I don’t agree in giving people premium member because they have given you money, donate via paypal is not illegal as what I know.

Give it a try, the government wouldn’t do much because of a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @GrandReborn GrandReborn
item.description:
@GrandReborn wrote:

Donations are not taxable.

If they were, the government isn’t going to track down their 30$ a month they might get, if your server is any good, and you pay for the websites,dedi and other costs

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:31, topic:266275”][quote author=satesql link=topic=351553.msg2699187#msg2699187 date=1236481313]

Technically, the donations would have to be included in your income tax because you are making money off of it. The only way to get around all this is write it off as a business expense, but I don’t know if that would be considered tax fraud or not.

Paypal doesn’t give one flying fuck about taxes. There supposed to send you some form, but I’ve never received any kind of form from them, and I’ve been receiving donations for over a year now…

Now about the JAgex suing question that’s been posted on here a million times before, I honestly don’t think they give a flying fuck either…
[/quote]
Key word there…[/quote]

And they don’t because its not a big deal. I received 600 dollars from google checks, and I didn’t have to claim it as income because there is a $850 threshold.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Paypal doesn’t give one flying fuck about taxes. There supposed to send you some form, but I’ve never received any kind of form from them, and I’ve been receiving donations for over a year now…

Now about the JAgex suing question that’s been posted on here a million times before, I honestly don’t think they give a flying fuck either…[/quote]

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

m.dog311:

Technically, the donations would have to be included in your income tax because you are making money off of it. The only way to get around all this is write it off as a business expense, but I don’t know if that would be considered tax fraud or not.

Paypal doesn’t give one flying fuck about taxes. There supposed to send you some form, but I’ve never received any kind of form from them, and I’ve been receiving donations for over a year now…

Now about the JAgex suing question that’s been posted on here a million times before, I honestly don’t think they give a flying fuck either…

Read full topic

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“miyu miyu5, post:19, topic:266275”]Snip again
Yes but since the TOS is actually helpfull in someway cuz they wont be able to sue or for money

evidence: i used visual basic to make a hacking program at my school to move my f’s to A and it worked but in the program i had a TOS not this one but almost alike and they tried to sue my family but since i had writen the TOS that i did this for educational purposes the couldnt get anymoney out of me but they still expelled more :)[/quote]
Looking further into that statement, how do you hack into a school with a program, how do you move Fs to As, why would you put a TOS on something unless you plan on releasing it (which basically makes it not for educational purposes…)?

You sir are spewing bullshit.

miyu miyu5:

Rofl that was really funny but killing someone is way different *hold on need to go to my garage to get my court papers (its going to say 2008 cuz it happed like 6 monthes ago do u want my expolision papers to ?

Yes. That is a great idea. Store documents which you might one day need, in a garage…

item.title: Is this Legal?
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:18, topic:266275”][quote author=miyu miyu5 link=topic=351553.msg2699133#msg2699133 date=1236479870]

[quote author=Uriko link=topic=351553.msg2699129#msg2699129 date=1236479741]

yes, the penalty for creating a runescape server is the death penalty. if ur caught u dont even get a trial, you’re just hung. please, do not get caught :(:(:(:(:(((

the question is ARE YOU?

basiclly u can use that as a TOS so they cant sue u ROFL learn to read and use ur brain

ROFL they cant do that cuz they dont own 317-500 anymore rofl but if ur so scared u can do

You are not an employee of Jagex LTD, runescape,
or adlex solicitors, and are not a family member
or acquaintance of the aforementioned. All of the
information on this site is solely for learning
purposes, as the main purpose of this site is to
instruct people in the art of programming. All
programs provided for download from this site are
entirely coded by the members of this community and
are not the intellectual property of any business or organization.

they cant sue if u do this
[/quote]What are you, fucking retarded?

[/quote]You don’t even know how to make a fucking quote, anyway… Did you read Cain_'s post? Do you actually think that’s legal?

That’s like having a grow-op at your house and putting up a sign on the front door saying “If you are affiliated with the municipal, state, or federal police you have no right searching this house or pressing charges if you believe there is marijuana here”

edit: wth, m.dog posted like the exact same analogy -__-[/quote]
well they cant lol if u got a sign up out side ur house they cant go in because that would be illegal because they would need a a search warrant
